name: You are late!
description:
Tap to the rhythm, reach your destination on time! Discover the new kind of a casual driving game seamlessly blended with an arcade music game! Use your reflexes and sense of rhythm!

FEATURES:
- INCREASINGLY DIFFICULT LEVELS: Can you finish all of them?
- UNIQUE CARS TO UNLOCK: Discover them as you play
- ACTION-RHYTHM GAMEPLAY: Use your reflexes and your ears!
- ONE-TOUCH CONTROLS: Easy to play with one hand!

You Are Late is a fast-paced arcade game that combines fast driving, sharp turns and cool music! Learn to play it by your finger and by your ear. Make quick, last minute decisions to avoid crashing, and reach your destination on time.

The game features 7 distinct levels full of twists and turns. Changing camera angle, dynamic environment and unpredictable progression keep things fresh and interesting throughout the game!

Play for a few minutes at a time or try to get as far as you can in one go. You Are Late will keep you entertained!
